name: Aquapolis
description:
What has happened to the Earth in this distant future? Why is the whole planet covered with water? Do any intelligent beings live here?

Find the answers to these questions with the help of a brilliant professor, the charming Lana and a charismatic captain. Help the locals turn an old, abandoned village into a thriving metropolis. Build a modern underwater city with fully developed infrastructure. Educate the underwater inhabitants about every aspect of your modern technology. Seek out the remnants of this past civilization and solve the cryptic messages of an unlucky scientist.

Play together with your Facebook friends and help them learn more about the underwater city-building.

Key features:

  • Build over 80 unique buildings and decorations for your city
  • Solve amazing mysteries and quests
  • Develop new technologies
  • Collect special tools for repairs and maintenance.
  • Play together with your Facebook friends
  • Immerse yourself in this underwater city environment thanks to the impressive 3D graphics
